results.title: Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: However, recurrent @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@acute pancreatitis@@@ secondary to the repeated use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ has been reported in the literature.

results.title: Discovering a Case of Lisinopril-Induced Necrotizing Pancreatitis.
results.text_hl: This case aims to make healthcare professionals aware of @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@AP@@@ as a side effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.
